testcase.classname: End to End Tests for ToolsQA's Book Store API
testcase.name: Authorized user is able to Add and Remove a book.
testcase.system-out: Given I am an authorized user...............................................passed Given A list of books are available.........................................passed When I add a book to my reading list........................................passed Then The book is added......................................................passed When I remove a book from my reading list...................................passed Then The book is removed....................................................passed
